source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a wide scenery shot of a Japanese suburban street. Initially, the frame shows a wet road in the middle ground, with a large tree in the left foreground and modern houses in the middle ground on the right. A white van is visible driving from right to left across the middle ground. The camera, positioned at eye level, then pans to the left, shifting the perspective to a sidewalk. In the final composition, the sidewalk occupies the left foreground, while a vibrant flowerbed fills the bottom right foreground. The road now curves away into the background, leading the eye toward distant houses and a large, netted structure in the center background.
